description: 15-minute group presentation (10 minutes + 5 minutes Q&A) on a research article/video related to development/aging of the visual system, followed by discussion. Includes critical analysis and peer interaction.
Individual 400-word critical review of the article/video used in the group presentation, focusing on development/aging topics. Feedback provided via marking rubric.
Two online quizzes (15% each) assessing lecture material from weeks 1-7, delivered via Inspera. Feedback based on response accuracy.
2-hour online exam covering all course materials (lectures, tutorials, discussions). Includes MCQs, short answer, and extended answer questions. Results contribute to final course mark.
